name: Burried in the bunker
description:
You're an urban tourist, who heard a lot of scary stories about abandoned bunker in the forest near your hometown.

One day you took your flashlight and traveled to this mysterious place. Going down the sewer, you found yourself in an old shooting range, which was used by the soldiers who were training here.

The floor and walls are covered in dried blood, and the metal bars that youclimbed up here have broken off. 

Now you have only one way - deep into the complex

Just a little game for testing and practicing in UE5 

Used projects: DaveFace's RetroShader
